trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There was one other sighting in Las Vegas on or around March 11th 2013
Summary: HUGE! Block-looking metal-looking heavy looking very high up. 3 times size of an airliner.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving to work... stuck in traffic. Looked off to my left (NW) and noticed a very odd looking shape just sitting in the air... very very high up, above the airliners flying under. I could see how huge it was compared to the airliners. It wasn't moving at all... and about 30 seconds after I was staring at it... it leaped up to the right and was GONE within a millisecond! I'm still in shock. I know what I saw. I'd like to know if anyone else saw it... and cannot believe for a second I was the only one who noticed it. It was very high up... but was very clear. I know what I saw. It was NOTHING that we could build. Nothing vanishes that fast... and especially when it's that massive. Please call me if you know what it could have been! Thank you! Christian Jensen 801.674.3123
